name: Clarion Hotel Stockholm
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Stockholm in Stockholm, SE near the Royal Opera, Casino Cosmopol and the Stockholm Globe Arena. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free Internet access, a spa, a restaurant and an indoor pool. All guest rooms have free wireless high-speed Internet and flat-screen TVs with free movie and sports channels. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Stockholm. There is 24-hour room service and valet parking available. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK/stay per pet.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Sign
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sign in Stockholm, SE near the Stockholm Central Station and the Arlanda Express train to Arlanda Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, an outdoor heated pool and more. All guest rooms have air cooling units and come equipped with hair dryers and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Sign. Pet charge: 200 KR/stay per pet. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm
description: This hotel is situated beside Central Station, 8 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Town Hall. Guests enjoy free entrance to the gym. The entrance fee for pool and saunas is 200 SEK. Breakfast is free for children under 7 years, while children up to 12 years have a discount. All the air-conditioned guest rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Viking have luxury beds and a bathtub or shower. Each room features a satellite TV and minibar. The in-house restaurant Stockholm Fisk serves internationally inspired cuisine, while HIGH - Cocktail Bar on the 9th floor offers city views. Archipelago boat trips depart from 2 nearby harbours and the Arlanda Express airport train departs from beside the Royal Viking. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 5-minute walk away and the Old Town is a 15-minute walk away.

name: At Six
description: Located right in the City Centre, steps away from shopping, nightlife, sights and transport, At Six, Ascend Hotel Collection is a perfect base to focus on your Stockholm destination in a whole new way. Elegance with a twist permeates our non-smoking Stockholm hotel, a new kind of exclusive urban lifestyle hotel guests can experience with all senses. We offer modern art and contemporary design by award-winning London-based Universal Design Studio, a vibrant restaurant and bar scene with an outstanding rooftop restaurant and additional amenities like free WiFi, a business center, 12 meeting rooms, gym and spa. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Hôtel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Stockholm. A short walk from Stockholm Palace, it offers modern rooms equipped with free wireless internet access, a mini bar and a private bathroom. This historic hotel provides a number of facilities, including a plunge pool, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will enjoy the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt's 144 elegant rooms offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV, plus all the essentials required for a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Stockholm, with Stortorget Stockholm just a short stroll away. The Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are a 10-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Profilhotels Nacka
description: ProfilHotels Nacka has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Stockholm. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Sickla Beach. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Guests at ProfilHotels Nacka will be able to enjoy activities in and around Stockholm, like hiking and skiing. Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Tele2 Arena is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 16 km from ProfilHotels Nacka.

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Scandic Skärholmen
description: This modern Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute stroll of Skarholmen Metro Station. It also offers a sauna, meeting rooms and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. There is also free private parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a sauna, a weight machine and free weights. The spacious rooms at Scandic Skarholmen have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and ironing facilities. They are also equipped with a hair dryer and a telephone. Scandic Skarholmen's restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner, offering guests an easy dining experience near their room. Alternatively, there are a range of eateries within a short stroll. The hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Kungens Kurva. Stockholm Palace and Kungstradgarden are an easy car trip away.Revato

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista
description: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista offers free WiFi, a shared sauna and bright rooms with a kitchenette. Kistamässan is a 5-minute walk away. A work desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are standard in each room. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, coffee/tea facilities and cooking hobs. All rooms feature private bathroom equipped with a shower and hairdryer. Guests have access to laundry facilities. Kista metro station is 10 minutes' walk away and offers connections to central Stockholm in 18 minutes. Kista Galleria is 1 km away, while Arlanda Airport is 30 km away from Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista.

name: Avanti Hotel
description: Located in Stockholm, 4.4 km from Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre, Avanti Apartment Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. The property is around 4.9 km from Monteliusvägen, 6 km from Stockholm Cathedral and 6.1 km from Museum of Medieval Stockholm. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a sauna. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room is fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Avanti Apartment Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. The Royal Palace is 6.2 km from Avanti Apartment Hotel, while Ericsson Globe is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Scandic Kungens Kurva
description: Located in Huddinge, Scandic Kungens Kurva is within a 40-minute drive of Stockholm-Arlanda Airport and offers a swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and a sauna. The various amenities this modern hotel features include meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Kungens Kurva has 257 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. There are also a number of rooms available for families. Scandic features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants close by. The area surrounding Scandic Kungens Kurva Hotel Huddinge is well-known for its shopping. Stockholm and Solna are located a short drive from the property.Revato

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik
description: Offering apartments, this aparthotel is just around the corner from Alvik Station with connections via metro, tram and bus. Stockholm city centre is only a 15-minute metro ride away. At Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik, views of south Stockholm can be enjoyed. All apartment options feature wooden floors and up-to-date décor. A kitchenette with 2 cooking hobs and a fridge and a seating area are standard. Large wardrobe space and cable TV channels provide extra comfort and convenience. Coffee/tea makers are available upon request. Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik welcomes you with a living room concept in the lobby. Keep up fitness routines at the fitness room. The Old Town and Stockholm City Hall are about 23-minutes metro ride away from Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik, and 10 minutes’ taxi ride from Stockholm-Bromma Airport. Friends Arena can be reached in 15 minutes by taxi.

name: 2Home Stockholm South
description: Located within a 5-minute drive to Stockholmsmässan Conference Centre, this hotel is set in the industrial district, Västberga. Stockholm City Centre is a 23-minute journey via public transportation. This hotel features a fitness room with sauna and free WiFi. Rooms at 2Home Stockholm South have a flat-screen TV, a telephone, a desk and armchairs. Free safes are available. The bathrooms are tiled and have shower and hairdryer. Additional leisure facilities including a table tennis. There is also a children's play area. There is a TV lounge area and a guest computer with internet access. There is a golf course just 1.2 km away. Ericsson Globe and Tele2 Arena are 5 km away from 2Home Stockholm South. Liljeholmen Shopping Centre and Bus Terminal is 3.6 km away. Årstabergs station is a 15-minute walk from the property. Free parking is possible yet limited.

name: Sky Hotel Apartments Stockholm
description: These modern apartments are only a 10-minute metro ride from Stockholm Central Station. Each has a modern kitchen, TV and free WiFi. All options at Sky Hotel Apartments Stockholm feature a cooker, fridge and microwave. Contemporary décor, a seating area and cable TV channels are standard. Guests can enjoy free access to a shared laundry room. Thorildsplan Metro Station is 4 minutes’ walk away.

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga
description: This budget hotel is a three minute drive from the E18 and 10 minutes from the E4 Motorway. It offers free private parking, a 24-hour reception desk and a late bar. Private bathrooms, cable TV and simple decor are standard features in all rooms at the Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga. The Bromma Airport is seven kilometers from Stockholm-Spanga. Avestagatan Bus Stop is 30 meters away and a five minute ride from Spanga Station. Trains connect to Stockholm Central Station in 12 minutes. The Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga is a great choice for travelers interested in riverside walks, cafes and convenient public transport.bestwestern.com

name: Victory Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm’s picturesque Old Town, Collector's Victory Hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Gamla Stan Metro Station. Its uniquely decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and heated bathroom floors. Inspired by its own maritime antique collection, the rooms at Collector’s Victory Hotel feature a naval theme. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant, Djuret, serves both meat and seafood dishes, using locally sourced and organic produce. Guest can also unwind with a drink in the cosy lounge bar Tweed, or visit the wine bar The Burgundy. Leisure options at Collector’s Victory include a sauna and a plunge pool.

name: Scandic Sodra Kajen
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 283 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a 24-hour fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Stockholm? This hotel has facilities measuring 7589 square feet (705 square meters), including a conference center. Property Location With a stay at Scandic Ariadne in Stockholm (Central Stockholm), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Värtahamnen Ferry Terminal and Stockholm Olympic Stadium. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Vasa Museum and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Gröna Lund. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Mistral serving guests of Scandic Ariadne. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM and on weekends from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM. Renovations This property is closed from November 1 2022 to June 1 2024 (dates subject to change). Optional Charges Nearby parking fee: SEK 110 per night (33 ft away) Pet fee: SEK 200 per accommodation, per stay Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in fee: SEK 150 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Only dogs and cats are allowed Maximum number of pets per room 2 Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is availableViajes Exito Hotels

name: Generator Stockholm
description: Generator Stockholm is set in Stockholm and is a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of the hostel, such as a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hostel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. The modern rooms feature views of the city. Bar Hilma is a modern place at Generator Stockholm to relax with a beverage after dinner. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. Generator Stockholm is ideally situated for discovering Stockholm with Central Post Office Building, Hotorget and Tegnerlunden within walking distance. Sergels Torg, Drottninggatan and Stockholm City Hall are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Scandic Kista
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Kista is within a 10-minute drive of Solvalla and offers disabled parking. It provides free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Kista Galleria. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel on offer to guests, such as a sauna, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. For those travelling with children Scandic Kista offers a games room. Rooms at Scandic Kista are well-appointed and have a private bathroom, a desk and a flat-screen TV. They are also fitted with cable/satellite channels, ironing facilities and a hair dryer. To make sure the day gets off to a good start, a buffet breakfast is provided every morning at the hotel's restaurant. A variety of eating options are also found in the area. Scandic Kista is ideally located for exploring Stockholm with Kista Science City within walking distance. Stockholm's Golf Club is within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Stf Af Chapman & Skeppsholmen
description: Located on Skeppsholmen island in Stockholm, this STF hostel is split between a late 1800s ship called Af Chapman and former navy barracks called Hantverkshuset. Moderna Museum and East Asia Museum within walking distance. Guest can choose from guest rooms or ship cabins. The guest rooms located in the main building feature large windows, high ceiling and views of the water or park. Some of the ship cabins have a small sitting area and a small window with a city view. Both options include access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Swedish breakfast buffet. The on-site café serves light meals. There is also a shared kitchen where guests can prepare own meals. During June to August, guests can relax on the sun deck on Af Chapman. The Östasiatiska Museet Bus Stop is 150 metres from the hostel. Kungsträdgården Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from STF af Chapman & Skeppsholmen.

name: Bo Hotel
description: Located by Tele2 Arena in Stockholm’s Tolv shopping area, this hotel offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Bo Hotel is 500 metres from Globen Metro Station. All the air-conditioned rooms at Bo Hotel feature a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Stockholm Central Station is a 10-minute metro ride away. The surrounding Tolv shopping area offers a bowling alley and a variety of shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm
description: As a guest at the Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm, you not only have an ideal location in the city center, but also a welcoming and homely atmosphere. With our 143 rooms and conference facilities the hotel is just as good whether you are here for business or pleasure. The hotel is owned by the YWCA-YMCA Central which is a non-profit organization with over 2,000 members, ranging from basketball, gymnastics, camps for music, choirs, orchestras, youth choir and more. All our profits go to the YWCA-YMCA Central's children and youth. The rooms are spacious and have good workspace and Wi-Fi. All rooms also have shower, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, safe, and free television. Garage is available but must be pre booked as we have limited space. Guests have free access to the gym, so you can stay in shape even when you're on the road. The gym is well equipped and has changing rooms plus a sauna. The dining room serves a large breakfast buffet each morning. The Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm is certified by Ecolabel, which means that we do our utmost to reduce energy consumption and use of chemicals. Here you can sleep with good conscience. From January 1, 2018, Best Western Kom Hotel is entirely cash free. It will be faster and easier for you as a guest, and you will be contributing to the safety of our staff. You can pay with all major credit cards or prepayment via 3rd party authorization. Thank you for your understanding and for helping us make our working environment safer.bestwestern.com

name: Stockholm Ängby Camping
description: Stockholm Ängby Camping offers basic accommodation with standard facilities in Stockholm, 10 km from Stockholm City Hall. Free WiFi and parking are offered. A terrace with garden views is offered in each unit as well as a kitchenette. Stockholm Ängby Camping provides a children's playground, a barbecue and a tennis court. Långholmen is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Hostel by Bromma
description: Located just 1.4 km from Bromma Airport, this hostel offers free on-site parking and free WiFi. Solvalla Horse Race Track is 3.6 km away. Central Stockholm can be reached in 30 minutes via public transport. Bromma Hus Hostel offers bright dormitory rooms with shared bathroom facilities. Guests can relax in the shared lounge. Other facilities include a children's playground. Shopping is available at Bromma Blocks, just 850 metres away from the hostel. Drottningholm Palace is 6.6 km away from Bromma Hus Hostel, while the centre of Bromma and Brommaplan are about 3 km away.

name: Riddersviks Herrgård
description: Located on the shores of Lake Mälaren, this elegant manor features a large garden and a private boat jetty. Stockholm’s city centre is 25 minutes’ drive away. Dating back to 1762, Riddersviks Herrgård today offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a writing desk. Traditional décor and garden views create a cosy atmosphere. Breakfast is served daily at Ridderviks Manor. A variety of restaurants as well as shops can be found at Hässelby Shopping Mall, a 10-minute walk away. Leisure options at Ridderviks Herrgård include billiards. In addition, the Viksjö Golf Course is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Clarion Hotel Sea U
description: Clarion Hotel Sea U is the perfect hotel both for your weekend getaway or your company meeting. During your stay you can visit one of our inspiring restaurants, our breathtaking Skybar, or relax on our outdoor terrace with pool and training facilities. You will also find shopping streets, restaurants and the local marina within a 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The hotel is a 3 minute walk away from the central station, where you can access both local and domestic transportation services. In only a 25 minute by car or taxi you will reach Angelholm-Helsingborg Airport for flight connections.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Helsingborg Nord
description: Located 5 km from Helsingborg’s city centre, this hotel is 15 minutes’ drive away from Helsingborg Ferry Terminal. Guests can enjoy free WiFi, free on-site parking and an indoor pool. Guest rooms at Scandic Helsingborg Nord each offer satellite TV and a work desk. They are classically decorated and feature wooden floors. The hotel’s restaurant Köksbaren offers classic dishes, including soups, pasta and sandwiches. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail in the on-site bar. Other facilities include a cosy library in the bar area and a children’s playground. Guests enjoy free access to the fitness centre, including a sauna and indoor pool. Fredriksdalsteatern, the outdoor theatre, is an 8-minute drive away from Scandic Helsingborg Nord. Hotel staff can recommend other area attractions and activities, such as Vasatorps Golf Club, 4 km away.

name: Helsingborg Hostel
description: Helsingborgs Vandrarhem, Helsingborg Hostel is located 800 metres from Helsingborg Central Station. It offers free tea and coffee and free WiFi internet access. All rooms at Hostel Helsingborg have a shared bathroom and a work desk. Facilities include a communal kitchen with a microwave, coffee maker and refrigerator. The Kärnan Museum with the medieval tower is a 15-minute walk from the hostel. Stortorget Square is 1 km away. Paid street parking is available.

name: Lydinge Resort
description: Situated next to the 18-hole Lydinge Golf Club, this hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Hyllinge’s main square and 15 minutes’ drive from central Helsingborg. It offers free private parking. Each room at Lydinge Golf Club Resort features parquet floors and a flat screen TV. A small putting green is available for a fee. Fishing licences can be bought for the neighbouring pond, where guests can also swim. Other nearby amenities include a lit jogging track and tennis courts. Lydinge has a restaurant with lunch specials and an a la carte menu. Hyllinge Shopping Centre also has a variety of restaurants and stores, about 1 km away.

name: Clarion Hotel Post
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Post in Gothenburg, SE near Liseberg, Ullevi Stadium, Slottskogen and the Swedish Exhibition and Congress Center. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center, outdoor and indoor pools, meeting space and a convention center. All guest rooms have refrigerators, TVs and coffee makers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Opera
description: This hotel is on Drottningtorget Square, 100 metres from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free gym access, free in-room WiFi, and Italian and American cuisine. Nordstan Shopping Centre is around the corner. ProfilHotels Opera’s rooms have modern bathrooms and include a hairdryer. Some also offer a 32-inch flat-screen TV, climate control and heated bathroom floors. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant that is open every day or have a cocktail at the bar. The indoor pool and two saunas can be used for an additional fee. The Nordstaden Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk away. Opera Hotel’s guests receive discounts at a nearby car park.

name: Elite Park Avenue Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is ideally located on Gothenburg’s main street, Avenyn, and directly across from the Landvetter Airport Bus Stop. It offers a popular restaurant, an English-style pub and free WiFi access. The Bishop’s Arms serves traditional pub fare from Monday to Saturday, and on Friday and Saturday guests can also eat in the onsite atPark Restaurant. All modern rooms at Elite Park Avenue Hotel feature climate control, a satellite TV and comfortable arm chairs. Free leisure options include a gym, 2 saunas and small relaxation pool. Massages and other treatments can be booked separately. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 10:30 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Elite Park Avenue is just 200 metres from Gothenburg Art Museum and the City Theatre. There are several private and public paid parking options available.

name: Avalon Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby bars and eateries. The hotel also provides a terrace on its roof equipped with a pool. This 4-star hotel offers porters, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Couples will adore the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All offer a flat-screen TV, a seating area and slippers. Guests staying at Avalon Hotel Gothenburg can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay nearby when looking for a bite to eat. Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is ideally situated for discovering Gothenburg with Kungsportsavenyn and Nordstan within a 10-minute walk. Gothenburg Cathedral is also only five minutes away.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Winn Goteborg
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Winn, Gotenborg in Gothenburg, SE near the Gothenburg Museum of Art, Goteborgs Konsthall art center, Gothenburg Concert Hall, Liseberg amusement park and Goteborg University. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a restaurant, an indoor pool and meeting space. Guest rooms come with hair dryers, desks and TVs. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Winn, Gotenborg. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents/grandparents with no additional bedding. All Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are 100 percent non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Europa
description: Located in the heart of Gothenburg, Scandic Europa is situated near Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby dining and nightlife options. It also offers an indoor pool, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Scandic Europa's stylish bar is an ideal spot to relax with a drink after dinner. Gothenburg's attractions, such as The Gothenburg Opera, are within a 10-minute walk of Scandic Europa. The surrounding area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Panorama, Gothenburg
description: This hotel is 7 minutes’ walk from the Swedish Exhibition Centre and Liseberg Amusement Park. The main shopping street, Avenyn is 1 km away. It offers free WiFi and free access to the relax area. All rooms at Comfort Hotel Panorama are decorated in modern Scandinavian style and some have city views. The hotel's Barception sells food & drinks. Comfort Hotel Panorama has a well-equipped gym that is free for hotel guests and open 24 hours a day.

name: Scandic Backadal
description: Scandic Backadal is located in Gothenburg and offers free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a playground. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, children's play area, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, an in-room closet and a private bathroom. There are also several rooms available for families. Serving international and local dishes, Scandic Backadal Hotel Gothenburg's relaxed restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those wishing to dine on site. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Hotel Backadal provides a convenient place to discover Gothenburg Cathedral and Liseberg, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa
description: CLOSE TO BOTH CITY & SEA - 15 minutes to Gothenburg City and close to Volvo Company headquarters, Arendal and the Ports of Gothenburg. With access to exclusive and indulgent experiences in a calm and tranquil world. Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa are exactly that. We have done our outmost to create a sanctuary, where it is great to just be. We offer you 149 comfortable, fully equipped and non-smoking guest rooms. 28 conference rooms with capacity and flexibility for 2-800 delegates and a high quality restaurant with excellent service. Art Garden Spa offers you an array of baths, saunas and activities at an additional charge. Children under 15 years are only allowed in the spa area during certain school holidays. The fitness gym is available to all guests, free of charge.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel 11
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel 11 in Gothenburg, SE near the Port of Gothenburg, Goteborgs Stadsmuseum museum, Gothenburg Opera, Goteborg Museum of Art and the Ostindiefararen, an old freight ship. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a sauna, meeting space and copy, print and fax services. Guest rooms come with TVs, trouser presses, irons, ironing boards and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel 11. Book now. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Spar Hotel Gårda
description: Spar Hotel Gårda is located 1.5 km from Gothenburg Central Station and Liseberg Amusement Park. It offers a popular buffet breakfast and free WiFi. A terrace is open throughout the summer. All rooms have cable TV, a work desk, wooden floors and a private bathroom. Facilities at the hotel include free gym and sauna access, as well as a children's playroom in the summertime.

name: Apple Hotel
description: Located 200 metres from Kaggeledstorget Tram Stop, this hotel is 3.5 km outside central Gothenburg. It offers an on-site lobby bar and a free dinner. Private parking and WiFi are also free. A TV, work desk, as well as a private bathroom are featured in each Apple Hotel & Konferens Göteborg guest room. Guests can work out at Apple Hotel's gym or relax in the outdoor pool during summer. A sauna is also available. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant. Guests can enjoy meals by the pool during summer. The hotel is a 11-minute tram ride from Liseberg Amusement Park. Sävenäs Train Station is 700 metres from the hotel. Nya Ullevi Stadium is a 5-minute tram ride away.

name: Linne Hostel
description: Linné Hostel is located within the Linnéstaden district of central Gothenburg. It offers a communal kitchen with a stovetop and a fridge. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at Linné Hostel are simply furnished and include access to shared bathroom facilities. Some rooms have a TV. The surrounding neighbourhood provides a wide variety of restaurants and nightlife options. Gothenburg Central Station is an 11-minute direct bus ride away. Gothenburg Botanical Gardens is 1.5 km away.

name: Forenom Aparthotel Malmö Varvsstaden
description: No description found

name: Scandic Segevång
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Segevang offers complimentary wireless internet and a gym. It also features free bicycle rental. Scandic Segevång offers modern accommodation, and is an ideal base for holiday makers or business travelers alike. The spa and wellness centre provides a chance to get pampered and relax. The rooms at Scandic Segevang are comfortable with facilities including a private bathroom. They feature blackout curtains, ironing facilities and a desk. Scandic Segevång Hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. There is a range of breakfast options to choose from each day. Scandic Segevang Hotel Malmo is under a 25-minute drive from Malmo Airport. Lund Cathedral, Malmo Arena and Lund University are within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden
description: The Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden is a Sami inspired family-owned hotel with a big heart and focus on the guest. The building was from the beginning a school but has been converted into a modern hotel of high class where style and design have been tastefully combined with today´s demands for comfort and service. The inspiration for the hotel genuine interior comes from the Sami culture and the Sapmi Region. The ownerd bought in 2006 the old school Norrmalmskolan and renovated it to the hotel that we proudly can offer our guests today. The hotel is centrally located within walking distance to the train, bus stations and city center. We offer our guests comfortable and bright airy rooms that are well suited for vacation as well as for work. All rooms are tastefully decorated with Sami inspired art. The hotel has two restaurants on site, PUB eden and Arctic Thai & Grill. As a guest at the Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden, you also have access to the hotel´s relaxation area with sauna and swimming pool. Wireless Internet is available in the entire hotel and is free of charge.bestwestern.com

name: Máttaráhkká Northern Light Lodge
description: No description found

name: Kiruna City Room
description: Located in Kiruna, within 3.2 km of Kiruna Train Station and 1.3 km of Kiruna Bus Station, Kiruna City Room provides accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is allergy-free and is set 4 km from LKAB Visitor Centre. Guest rooms at the hostel are equipped with a seating area. At Kiruna City Room, each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower. You can play billiards at the accommodation. Esrange Space Center is 41 km from Kiruna City Room, while Kiruna Folkets Hus is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Kiruna Airport, 8 km from the hostel.

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Visby Börs
description: Set within 200 metres of Almedalen Park and 1.8 km of Visby Ferry Terminal, Hotell Visby Börs features rooms in Visby. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 400 metres from Wisby Strand Congress & Event. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotell Visby Börs, rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. You can play billiards at Hotell Visby Börs, and bike hire is available. Gotska Golf Club is 3.7 km from the hotel, while Lugnet Golf Course is 7.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Visby Airport, 3 km from Hotell Visby Börs.

name: Börsen Apartment Suites
description: With a stay at Börsen Apartment Suites in Visby (Innerstaden), you'll be steps from Gotlands Art Museum and Almedalen. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Visby? This hotel has facilities measuring 2691 square feet (250 square meters), including a meeting room.Hotels.com

name: Novi Resort
description: Located by Norderstrand Beach, this property offers guest rooms and apartments in Visby and just 1 km from Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre. It offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a large terrace. NOVI Resort’s rooms feature modern décor, designer furniture and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All options have private patios or balconies with Baltic Sea views. Most have a kitchenette. Guest can hang out by the poolside or eat at NOVI's summer restaurant Grill & Bar between June and August. It offers light dishes, gourmet dining and great sea views. NOVI Resort is a 10-minute walk from Visby’s 13th-century city wall and Almedalen Park. Gotska Golf Course is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Scandic Visby
description: This harbour side hotel is just across the street from Gotland’s ferry terminal and 10 minutes’ walk from Visby’s medieval city centre, itself a UNESCO World Heritage Site. WiFi internet access is free in all rooms. Guests enjoy free gym, pool and sauna access. Bookable spa treatments are available for a fee. Each guest room at Scandic Visby offers a TV and private bathroom. Many of the ground-floor rooms have private furnished patios. Guests can book boat tickets and rent bicycles at Visby Scandic’s reception. Young children will appreciate the on-site playground. The lobby bar serves snacks and drinks. Guests can enjoy the poolside Restaurant Koggen year-round. Private parking spaces are found on-site. additional cost will apply. Within a 5-minute drive are attractions such as Visby Museum and the 12th-century cathedral.

name: Kolgården - Visby Lägenhetshotell
description: Kolgården - Visby Lägenhetshotell is located 800 metres from the Visby medieval city wall. Offering comfortable self-catering apartments with free WiFi and private on-site parking. During summer season, guests can enjoy a child-friendly pool. All apartments features a TV, a seating area and a fully equipped kitchen fitted with a dishwasher and a microwave. The bathrooms come with a shower and guests can enjoy a pool view from their apartment. Communal facilities at the property include a BBQ area and a laundry room. The popular Tofta Beach is 20 km away and Gotska Golf Club is 1.3 km from the property

name: Best Western Strand Hotel
description: A first class hotel with a service minded staff and environmental certification. The hotel is located in the middle of the town, near the sea inside the city wall of the World Heritage town of Visby. Beautiful medieval houses and alleys in Visby surround the hotel. The Best Western Strand Hotel is the old Visby Brewery which became a hotel in 1982, from a family owned hotel with 13 rooms to one of the largest hotels in Visby today with 124 rooms and suites. Ferry and airport are within easy reach. Please note: Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 20 years of age if no parents are attending.bestwestern.com

name: Snäck Annex
description: This budget hotel is 850 metres from Gotland’s popular Snäckviken Beach and only a 7-minute drive from Visby. It offers free private parking, two tennis courts and outdoor pools. Dating back to the 1950s, the simple rooms at Snäck Annex have a small bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a refrigerator and free bed linen and towels, and many offer sea views. Snäck Annex’s common room has a kitchenette, and guests can also relax on the surrounding lawn. Other facilities include a tennis court, an outdoor pool and a kiddie pool. Buses to Visby city centre depart from nearby, while Visby Airport is only a 3-minute drive from the hotel.

name: First Hotel Kokoloko
description: Located in Visby, 1.3 km from Visby Ferry Terminal, First Hotel Visby has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and 2 barbecue areas, as well as free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The hotel features a hot tub. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Almedalen Park is 2 km from First Hotel Visby. The nearest airport is Visby Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Clarion Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal in Stockholm-Arlanda, SE near Sky City, Rosersberg Palace and Skansen. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center and meeting space. All guest rooms have refrigerators, TVs, mini bars, desks, coffee makers and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and younger stay free when they share the same room with their parents or grandparents, if no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal
description: Explore the fascinating city of Stockholm from modern AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal. Our 4 star hotel is located in Solna, 10 minutes from Stockholm city center, and perfect for business meetings and events. It is strategically located near public transport and walking distance to Friends Arena, Arenastaden och Mall of Scandinavia. Our pet friendly hotel offers an urban, modern, high-style design for a feeling of harmony and creativity. Featuring 223 hotel rooms and suites, AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal also offers meeting rooms, a bar and restaurant PicPoc by Pontus Frithiof, and Viitalize Gym and Wellness. The conference center includes 3 multi-functional meeting rooms with the capacity to host 110 guests in the largest meeting room. The meeting rooms are all equipped with the latest technology, necessary equipment as well as hi-speed WiFi for a successful business event. Relax in our Nordic hotel spa and fitness center with saunas, pools, and treatments.Marriott

name: Hoom Park & Hotel
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from Ulriksdal Station, this modern hotel is 10 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm Central Station. It offers free WiFi access and guest rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Friends Arena is 3 km away, while Kista Convention Center is 5 km from the property. The air-conditioned guest rooms at HOOM Park & Hotel feature wooden floors. Many include a seating area. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist. The hotel bar is a nice place for an after-dinner drink. The E4 Highway is just 100 metres from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Clarion Hotel Winn
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Winn in Gavle, SE near the University College of Gavle, Baltic Sea, Swedish Railway Museum, Mackmyra Whisky distillery and the Valbo Shopping Centre. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor heated pool, meeting space and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Frösö Park Hotel
description: Located on the stunning island of Froson, the Hotel Froso Park, Ascend Hotel Collection, is surrounded by a golf course, as well as outdoor activities like running, cycling, hiking, skiing and snowmobiling. This pet-friendly hotel is also close to Ostersund and all the attractions you will want to check out on your trip, including Winter Park, Moose Garden and the Froso Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, a hot tub, meeting space, spa facilities, a dance floor, free breakfast, free weekday newspapers, free WiFi and an indoor and outdoor gym and fitness center, to name a few. Guest room amenities include desks and sofa sleepers. Ask about our suites and superior rooms. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Sundsvall
description: A top hotel in Sundsvall in a new part of the city, which is still very centrally located and also very close to the Selangers river. We are inspired by the Sundsvall stone town, and by the Medelpad landscape stone, the Alnoit and also by the contrast between the light and dark seasons. The hotel provides 270 rooms, restaurants, bars, rooftop terrace, spa and a large conference area.Choice Hotels

name: The Lamp Hotel Norrkoping
description: This boutique hotel is housed in a refurbished 18th-century building. Just 50 metres from Norrköping’s main street, Drottninggatan, it features and on-site spa, free WiFi internet access and garden in the summer time. The Lamp Hotel’s modern, guest rooms feature a comfortable seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar are also provided in each room. All bathrooms have underfloor heating and luxurious shower amenities from Babor. Housing Sweden’s largest floor lamp, The Lamp Restaurant serves Asian-Swedish Fusion dishes. In summer, meals can be taken out onto the garden. The Lamp Hotel & Spa is in the heart of central Norrköping. Norrköping Central Station is a 10-minute walk away from the hotel and the Louis De Geer Concert Hall & Congress Centre is 350 metres away. You will find shopping, restaurants and cafés just a few steps from the hotel.

name: Scandic Infra City
description: This modern hotel in Upplands Vasby offers free Wi-Fi, as well as a sauna and a swimming pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a flat-screen TV, blackout curtains and an in-room closet. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of cafés and restaurants are also found close by. Stockholm-Arlanda Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Scandic Infra City. Kista is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Profilhotels Savoy
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Jönköping, with the city right outside the doorstep and Lake Vättern 500 metres away. It offers a popular breakfast buffet, a relaxation area and modern rooms with free WiFi. The individually designed rooms of ProfilHotels Savoy include luxury beds, flat-screen TVs and large bathrooms with underfloor heating. In addition, dumbbells are provided in each room. Guests also have free access to a fitness room with sauna. Brasserie Sofiehof offers Swedish specialities as well as international dishes for lunch and dinner. After-work specials and other events are hosted throughout the year. Free tea and coffee is available in the lobby around the clock. Savoy Hotel’s central location offers easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. The Match Museum is a 10-minute walk away, while Jönköping Central Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away. Elmia Congress Centre is within 10 minutes' drive.

name: Best Western Plus Savoy Lulea
description: Offering free spa and gym entrance and a modern restaurant and bar, this hotel is centrally located in Luleå, just 300 metres from Luleå Central Station. The spa includes 2 hot tubs, a steam sauna, a traditional sauna and an ice shower. Guests can also book treatments such as massages and facials. Each room features a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and seating area. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. The restaurant offers a varied á la carte menu based on local Swedish cuisine, open Monday to Saturday. A rich lunch buffet is also served on weekdays. The lobby café is open 24-hours and offers light dishes and beverages. On Saturdays, Hotel Savoy hosts a nightclub as well as live music on occasions. The hotel is 1.4 km from Coop Arena and 400 metres from the cultural centre Kulturens Hus. Kallax Airport is 9 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Aby Hotel
description: The Aby Arena is the only meetings and event venue in Scandinavia that combines a top modern trotting race course with an exhibition center, meetings, a hotel, a fitness center and a variety of dining opportunities. It is a dynamic destination for attendees seeking a truly unique experience. With 223 bedrooms, the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel forms an important part of the Aby Arena. In order to strengthen the ambiance of a venue that is full of action, expectations and joy, the interior design of the hotel has been inspired by an amusement park. Regardless of the purpose of your stay, we hope that our guests regard the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel as an arena full of action and exciting moments. The room types we offer include standard rooms, superior, deluxe, extended stay and economy. In addition to the normal sized double rooms we offer 72 rooms that can accommodate up to 5 guests. Restaurant Lyon is closed until further notice. We refer our guests to our own lobby bar in the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Ad Astra by Elite
description: Located in Södertälje, 220 meters from Tom Tits Experiment, Ad Astra by Elite provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room has a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have river views. The hotel has a spa with both indoor and outdoor pools, a private movie theater and activities on site like shuffleboard and pool game. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet with delicious ingredients catering to all sorts of preferences. Guests can enjoy drinks and pizza by the fountain on the Italian piazza during the summer time. Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre is 28 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 39 km from Ad Astra by Elite.

name: Quality Hotel Royal Corner
description: The non-smoking Quality Hotel Royal Corner offers real value for your hard-earned money in the heart of Vaxjo, Sweden near the Vaxjo City Centre, shops, nightlife and attractions like Grand Samarkand shopping mall, the house of Emmigrants, Vaxjo Cathedral, Kingdom of Crystal and Little Rock Lake Zipline. Hold your next work or social event in in one of our 11 meeting rooms, grab breakfast in our La Castellina restaurant and enjoy amenities like free WiFi, free parking, an indoor heated pool, sauna and fitness center. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund in Ostersund, SE near Mid Sweden University, Storsjon Lake, the Jamtli museum, Froso Zoo and Froso Kyrka. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast buffet, wireless Internet access, a restaurant, an indoor heated pool and meeting and convention facilities. All guest rooms have trouser presses, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards and desks. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Ostersund hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Örebro
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Orebro in Orebro, SE near Orebro Castle, Wadkoping village, Gustavsvik water park, Karlslund Manor House, Orebro University and the Orebro Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a restaurant, an exercise room, sundeck, a business center and meeting facilities. All guest rooms include work desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. Some rooms also have coffee makers and refrigerators. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Orebro hotels like our Clarion Hotel Orebro. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing a room with parentsgrandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Hedasen
description: Welcome to the friendly Best Western Hedasen, located by the Sandviken Golf Course, 300 meters from Lake Storsjon and three kilometers from central Sandviken. All rooms have a work desk, an electric kettle and a television with DVD player. DVD films can be borrowed for free at the front desk. The hotel offers and indoor pool, sauna, free parking and free Wi-Fi. Central Sandviken is only 3 kilometers from the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Hotel The Box
description: Get more for your hard-earned money at our hotel in Linkoping, SE. You will love our convenient location, friendly service and more. Amenities include free WiFi, free hot breakfast, meeting space, a fitness center and a restaurant and bar. Guest rooms feature refrigerators and microwaves, premium bedding, work desks, flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Our hotel in Linkoping is near the Linkoping Arena, Saab Arena, Max Burgers, Rico Restaurant and BK Living Room Restaurant. At our pet-friendly Quality Hotel, our affordable rates and central location lets you focus on making your trip a memorable one. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with Our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Arkad
description: This eco-friendly hotel is a few minutes’ walk from Västerås’s main streets, Vasagatan and Stora Gatan. It offers free Wi-Fi, a free relaxation area with sauna and individually decorated guest rooms. Wooden floors, a TV and a desk are standard room features at Hotell Arkad. Some rooms also include a seating area. Guests can relax with a game of dart or billiards. Other facilities include a common room with TV and a small library. The hotel serves a daily breakfast buffet. In the evenings, guests can order wine, beer and light dishes at reception. Västerås Central Station and Aros Congress Center are within 5 minutes’ walk of Arkad Hotell.

name: Vadstena Klosterhotell Konferens & Spa
description: Housed in a former monastery from the Middle Ages, this historic hotel is located on Lake Vättern in quaint Vadstena. Guests can relax with in the peaceful settings or at the on-site spa. It features free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Vadstena Klosterhotell’s classically decorated guest rooms feature cable TV and a separate seating area. Some are located in the monastery building, while others are in a grand 19th-century building. The spa can be accessed for a surcharge and includes hot baths, a sauna, a steam bath and a variety of spa and massage treatments. Guests can also enjoy an outdoor hot tub, a cafe/bar, a relaxation room and a gym. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the neighbouring Vadstena Castle and the town’s idyllic main street. Vadstena Golf Club is 10 minutes’ drive away. Motala Train Station, 17 km away, is the closest stop to the hotel.

name: Scandic Landvetter
description: Set in Landvetter, 19 km from Vattenpalatset, Scandic Landvetter offers air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as a fitness centre and a sauna. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Scandic Landvetter also have free WiFi. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. You can play table tennis at Scandic Landvetter. Liseberg is 24 km from the hotel, while Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, a few steps from Scandic Landvetter.

name: Ludvika Stadshotell
description: This family-run hotel is situated in Ludvika, 200 metres from the train station. It offers free WiFi and free access to a nearby fitness centre. Rooms here are individually decorated and include a desk, TV & armchair. The bathroom has free toiletries, a hairdryer and a shower. The Stadshotell serves a breakfast buffet. Shops, cafes and restaurants are only a few minutes walk from the hotel.

name: Quality Hotel Galaxen
address: Jussi Björlings Väg 25, 784 32 Borlänge, Dalarnas Lan
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Galaxen in Borlange, SE near the Kupolen area, Kupolen Kopcentrum, Hogskolan Dalarna University and the nearby Jussi Bjorling Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a sauna, a hot tub, a convention center and copy, print and fax services. Guest rooms come with TVs and hair dryers. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Galaxen. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Billingehus
description: For over fifty years, the iconic hotel has balanced like a monument on Billingen's escarpment. Equal parts of course as the special. Check in with family, love, friends, the training group or why not by yourself, for some well-deserved alone time? Billingehus is the hotel for those looking for warm and welcoming accommodation in Skvde, with closeness to nature and a nice mix of experiences both inside and out.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel Statt
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel Statt in Hudiksvall, Sweden puts guests close to golfing, shopping at Guldsmeden and Fyren and the beach. Amenities at our smoke-free hotel include a meeting space, a hotel restaurant and bar, free breakfast, free WiFi, free parking, an indoor pool and a fitness center. Get your money's worth at the Quality Hotel Statt. Hotels in Hudiksvall offer comfortable rooms with the amenities you have come to expect. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Entré Norr
description: Offering a barbecue and views of the garden, Hotell Entré Norr is set in Umeå, 5 km from Umeå universitet. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free parking is available. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy an evening buffet, for an additional cost which is served Monday until Sunday. The dinner must be booked in advance via the hotel. Free use of bicycles is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Aula Nordica is 6 km from Hotell Entré Norr, while Norrlands Opera House is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Umea Airport, 9 km from Hotell Entré Norr.

name: Varbergs Gk Östra Hotell
description: Situated in Grimeton, 18 km from Varberg Train Station, Varbergs GK Östra Hotell features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna. The property is non-smoking and is located 21 km from Gekås Ullared Superstore. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. Varbergs GK Östra Hotell provides some units with mountain views, and the rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. You can play billiards at Varbergs GK Östra Hotell. Varberg Fortress is 17 km from the hotel, while Varberg Golf Club is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Halmstad Airport, 65 km from Varbergs GK Östra Hotell.

name: Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar
description: Dramatically set where the Hallandsåsen Ridge meets the Kattegatt Sea, Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Hotell offers a spa, rooms with private balconies and free WiFi access. Båstad is just 15 minutes’ drive away. Each of Hotel Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar’s rooms has a private bathroom with shower. All include a refrigerator, a tea/coffee maker and an LCD TV with cable channels. The in-house restaurant offers local specialities and panoramic sea views. Guests can explore the cliffs, beaches and caves of the surrounding Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Nature Reserve. Treatments can be reserved at the on-site wellness centre.

name: Scandic Örnsköldsvik
description: This hotel is just 2 km from central Örnsköldsvik, Paradisbadet Water Park and Fjällräven Center. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, pool and sauna. Scandic Örnsköldsvik offers guests a free organic breakfast buffet and Wi-Fi internet access. All guest rooms have easy chairs, desks and satellite TV with movie channels. Scandic Örnsköldsvik serves Fairtrade coffee and also has a 24-hour shop. The in-house Bistro Höga Kust serves both local and international delicacies. The Lobby Bar offers snacks and drinks.

name: Scandic Luleå
description: Just 1 km from Coop Arena and 10 minutes’ drive from Luleå Airport, this eco-friendly hotel offers free sauna, pool and gym access. Luleå Central Station and the city centre are 3 km away. All rooms at Scandic Luleå have a TV, desk and private bathroom with shower. Some rooms include tea/coffee facilities, bathrobes and movie channels. The in-house Norrport restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet, weekday lunches and dinner from Monday to Saturday. Bicycle rentals can be arranged, and a body massage chair is also available. Måttsundsbacken Winter Sports Centre is 20 minutes’ drive from Scandic Luleå.

name: Nynäs Havsbad
description: This early 1900s property is in Nynäshamn, on Trehörningen Island. It offers spa treatments, panoramic sea views and fine dining. Stockholm city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. Nynäs Havsbad’s modern rooms have a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Modern European cuisine made from seasonal, local produce is served in the restaurant. A set 3-course menu is offered Monday-Thursday, with à la carte options at weekends. The hotel offers pool and sauna facilities for an extra fee. Various treatments are offered at the on-site spa. In the wintertime, it is possible to take a dip in a hole in the ice. Free public parking spaces are found nearby. Nynäs Havsbad Hotel is 1.5 km from Nynäshamn Station, and Nynäshamn Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes’ drive.

name: Scandic Elmia
description: This hotel is found next to Elmia Exhibition Centre and Rosenlundsbadet Water Park, 10 minutes’ walk from the shores of Lake Vättern. Sauna, gym and guest bicycles are free. The bright rooms at Scandic Elmia feature wooden floors, modern décor and cable TV and free WiFi is offered throughout the building. The hotel restaurant serves a hearty breakfast buffet. Guests can enjoy an apéritif or after-dinner coffee in the bar. Neighboring area contains multi-sporting arenas such as tennis, bowling, paddle, curling, swimming, football, and ice hockey. Scandic Elmia offers free private parking on site, you need to register your car at check in. 10 minutes’ drive from Jönköping Central Station.

name: Best Western Motala Stadshotell
description: The Best Western® Motala Stadshotell is a classic hotel situated in the heart of Motala, close to Lake Vattern, Gota Kanal and to Europe’s largest lake beach, Varamon. We are within walking distance from shopping, waterfront and guest harbor. Close by are also the golf courses of Motala and Vadstena. All rooms are non-smoking, and many of them have a fantastic view of the lake. We do not accept pets. Our multilingual and service minded staff will give you personalized service. On the ground floor you find our restaurant, the gastro pub Berggrens Öltapp & Mat. They also serve our large breakfast buffet, which is something we are especially proud of. The conference and gala floor previously housed Moala’s town hall. In the magnificent Anglasalen (Angel's Hall) everything from conferences, exhibitions and balls, to banquets and local reviews can be arranged, underneath the cut glass chandeliers. Come experience the charm of the Best Western® Motala Stadshotell!bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Plus Skogshojd
description: With a stay at Scandic Skogshöjd, you'll be centrally located in Sodertalje, just a 4-minute walk from Torekallberget Open Air Museum and 10 minutes by foot from Tom Tits Experiment. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.Hotels.com

name: Scandic Star Sollentuna
description: Located beside Sollentuna Centrum shopping mall, this hotel is only a 15-minute train ride from central Stockholm. Guests enjoy free access to the relaxation area with pool, gym and sauna. Each spacious room at Scandic Star Sollentuna is decorated in warm colours and features a work desk and cable TV. Most rooms have a separate bedroom and living room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel Scandic Sollentuna’s restaurant offers classic Scandinavian cuisine as well as international dishes. Afternoon coffee and evening cocktails can be enjoyed in the lotus shaped bar. For relaxation, guests can visit the on-site Star Spa and try a variety of face and body treatments, including massage, facial treatments and nail care. More active types will find walking and jogging trails nearby. Sollentuna Train Station is only 250 metres away, and Stockholm Arlanda Airport is reached within a 20-minute drive.

name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda
address: Kabinvaegen 3, P O Box 103, 190 60 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Set in Arlanda, this modern hotel features valet parking, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Just moments from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, it offers a stylish stay in a convenient location. Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel provides rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They provide an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel can sample international dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. There are a variety of restaurants and cafés near Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, and Rosersberg is an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Jönköping
description: The Comfort Hotel is centrally located in the heart of Jonkoping. The Jonkoping Airport and Jonkoping University are just minutes away. Visitors will enjoy touring the various local museums nearby, including the Match Museum, Munksjo Museum, Jonkopings lans Museum and the Husqvarna Fabriksmuseum. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, free wireless Internet, free full breakfast, a sauna, to name a few. Guest rooms have mini bars, desks and hair dryers. Some rooms come with coffee makers and refrigerators. Come experience service with a smile.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Vanersborg
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Vanersborg near the Gota Canal, Vanersborg Museet museum, Naturskola Nature Center and the Vanersborg Doll Studio and Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a restaurant, an indoor pool, an exercise room and meeting space. Guest rooms come with desks and TVs. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Vanersborg. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Gävle Väst
description: Set next to the river Gavleån and Motorway E4, this hotel provides free Wi-Fi and free access to gym, sauna and indoor pool. Central Gävle is 5 minutes’ drive away. The rooms at Scandic Gävle Väst feature bright, Scandinavian décor. All include a work desk and many also have a seating area. The in-house restaurant serves a varied seasonal à la carte menu as well as daily specials. Scandic Gävle Väst’s bar has a wide-screen TV and offers a selection of light dishes. Next to the restaurant is a playroom with toys, films and computer games. In addition, the hotel has a playground. Bicycles can be borrowed for free on site, and drinks, snacks and other amenities are available in Scandic’s lobby shop. Next to the hotel are free public parking spaces. Local buses stop nearby, and the ride to Central Station takes less than 15 minutes. Scandic Gävle Väst is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Best Western Valhall Park Hotell
description: The Best Western Valhall Park Hotell is a family friendly hotel with a relaxing atmosphere surrounded by fruit trees, Copper Beech trees and historic sites from the bronze age, located in a beautiful and serene Angelholm. The hotel has 70 rooms, restaurant, bar, conference facilities and from June 2021 relax and spa and hotel gym. Our guests praise us for our high quality, locally sourced made from scratch food, where we focus on seasonal ingredients to enhance your culinary experience. The Bjare Peninsula and the countryside of Kulla offers a rich and accessible nature with its beaches, parks, hiking and biking trails, vineyards, local stores and farmers market, shopping, churches, and historical sites, some dated back to the bronze age. Valhall Park offers a peaceful environment where you can collect your thoughts, with its own walking and running paths, paddle lanes, as well as a gym and group exercise activities at Friskis & Svettis. The hotel is located close to the north Atlantic Ocean (1.5 kilometers), with long stretches of white sandy beaches by Skalderviken. The Kattegatt Trail offers excellent biking, walking, and running paths. The hotel has a unique location being close to the Angelholm-Helsinborg Airport, the E6 Interstate, and the train station Barkakra, connected to Halmstad and Helsingborg.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotell Ett
description: No description found

name: Holiday Club Åre
address: Are Strand Box 68, 830 13 Åre, Jamtlands Lan
description: Location This family-friendly Are hotel is located near the airport, within 1 mi (2 km) of Are Beach and Are Ski Resort. Are Cable Car and Are Old Church are also within 10 minutes. Åre Station is only a 4-minute walk. Room All rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and flat-screen TVs. Hair dryers, safes, and showers are among the other amenities that guests will find. Amenities Along with 2 restaurants, this smoke-free hotel has an indoor pool and an outdoor pool. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, a health club, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café are onsite.WebBeds

name: Mountain Lodge
description: Located in Stöten, 35 km from Experium, Mountain Lodge provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. 35 km from Snötorget, the property offers a ski pass sales point, as well as ski-to-door access. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The area is popular for skiing, and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel. The nearest airport is Scandinavian Mountains Airport, 18 km from Mountain Lodge.

name: Aurum Hotel
description: Situated next to the E4 highway in Skellefteå, Aurum Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and tastefully decorated rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs. Skellefteå city centre is 1.5 km away. All guest rooms at Aurum Hotel have beds by Lectus and a private bathroom with shower. Most rooms include a seating area. Guests have access to the relax area, featuring an indoor swimming pool, uni-sex sauna and hot tub. Massages can be booked at the in-house Daggdroppen Spa. Other facilities include a pool table and a mini golf course. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Refreshing drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Boda Borg Family Entertainment Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Skellefteå Golf Club is 5 km away.
